title: Requires charitable solicitations made by the use of containers left unattended to post the percentage of the collection that actually goes to the charitable purpose
summary: Requires charitable solicitations made by the use of containers left unattended to post on the container the percentage of the collection that actually goes to the charitable purpose.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3174

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. PRETLOW, MAYERSOHN -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of
         A.  BRENNAN,  CLARK,  ENGLEBRIGHT,  GABRYSZAK, GALEF, JACOBS, MORELLE,
         PHEFFER, TOWNS, WEINSTEIN -- read once and referred to  the  Committee
         on Governmental Operations

       AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to charitable collections

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 174 of the executive law is amended by adding a new
    2  subdivision 5 to read as follows:
    3    5. ALL CHARITABLE SOLICITATIONS MADE BY THE USE OF UNATTENDED CONTAIN-
    4  ERS SHALL HAVE POSTED ON THE CONTAINER THE PERCENTAGE OF FUNDS  ACTUALLY
    5  USED FOR THE STATED CHARITABLE PURPOSES.
    6    S  2.  Section  174-b  of the executive law is amended by adding a new
    7  subdivision 6 to read as follows:
    8    6. ALL CHARITABLE SOLICITATIONS MADE BY THE USE OF UNATTENDED CONTAIN-
    9  ERS SHALL HAVE POSTED ON THE CONTAINER THE PERCENTAGE OF FUNDS  ACTUALLY
   10  USED FOR THE STATED CHARITABLE PURPOSES.
   11    S  3.  This  act  shall take effect on the sixtieth day after it shall
   12  have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02818-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to charitable collections
